captions.text: Here we are at the Hello Kitty Café and I'm soooo excited /fake excited voice
Here we are at the Hello Kitty Café!  EEEEEEEE!
I don't think I can drink it!
Ahhh!  She's dead!  She's dead!  Simon you killed her!
Oh, you bet!  I'd love to come here everyday!
Umm, can I drink my latte now?  It looks more like Hello Zombie.
Uhh, no it's not the greatest, this place actually sucks.
What?  You want me to say it again?  I'll say it again.  This place sucks!
Actually, I was a little disappointed to be honest.
I kinda expected a cosplay kinda feel, like everyone wearing pink and white frilly dresses
with, like, ears and like, Hello Kitty music,
but instead it was like a really cramped café with Hello Kitty paraphernalia
and all the servers were wearing just, like, normal stuff.
So, yeah, plus the 90's music: that didn't really help.
But this does not keep me from Hello Kitty and I being BFFs
Uhh, wait a minute.  Those are just videos of me with Hello Kitty superimposed on my face.
Yeah, couldn't you tell with like the giant body beneath the Hello Kitty?
Oh.  That would explain why Hello Kitty smelled so bad.
THAT WOULD EXPLAIN WHY HELLO KITTY SMELLED SO BAD.

comments.author: Lunay LeZarde

comments.text:
My wife would HATE this. She's a total tomboy, and all that pink would make 
her think of Pepto-Bismal the whole time we were there. Pretty much the 
only way I'd be able to talk her into going there in the first place is by 
getting her to take a sucker bet, and even then, I'd have to soften the 
blow by telling her she can ruthlessly mock the place the whole time. Me, 
I'd find it a fascinating insight to the girly-girl ego. For more Hello 
Kitty, watch this Lisa Loeb MV: /watch?v=cBvk3GjYTRE
comments.author: Lunay LeZarde

comments.text:
There are different levels of severity with lactose intolerance. Most can 
handle a little bit, especially with the help of a lactase supplement. My 
wife & I, on the other hand, would amaze most Koreans with our lactose 
tolerance. The two of us go through a gallon of milk every other day. 
Neither of us has ever broken a bone, either. ^_^
comments.author: Lunay LeZarde
